Texts.Chs: 可怜的植物 - 把这么多的能量投入到一种化学防御机制中，只有人类才会觉得它更有食欲。尽管如此，我认为它比地球上大多数的本地植物都要好，总的来说...
Texts.Eng: Poor plant - so much energy put into a chemical defense mechanism, only for humans to find it even more appetizing. Though, I suppose it's doing better than most of Earth's native flora, all things considered...
